Faction.name: Vonetis Sea
Faction.Description: All Heroes deal increased damage based on the number of active Synergies. At 8 active Synergies, they also gain Hybrid Lifesteal.

2.description: Each active Synergy increases damage by 1%. Gain 8% Hybrid Lifesteal when 8 Synergies are active.

3.description: Each active Synergy increases damage by 2%. Gain 12% Hybrid Lifesteal when 8 Synergies are active.
